title: AutobiographicalEvent
description: Structured representation of a single life event or story mentioned in an interview session.

id.description: Unique identifier for the event, e.g. 'ev_2025_001'.

title.description: Short, descriptive title for the event.

time_range.description: Approximate time span of the event.

life_stage.description: Broad life stage, e.g. 'childhood', 'school', 'university', 'early work', 'mid-career', 'later life'.

location.description: Main place or places where this event occurred.

people.description: Key people involved in or affected by this event.

domains.description: Tags describing the domain(s) this event touches, e.g. ['family', 'education', 'work', 'health', 'hobbies'].

significance.description: Why this event matters or stands out, in Tony's own terms as much as possible.

description.description: Short narrative description of what happened.

source_session_id.description: Identifier of the interview session this event came from.
